content: Set up a personal assistant for your team: add a knowledge base, choose the right model, and connect an MCP server. Invite colleagues so they can use the agentâ€™s chats with you.

comment.text: This text explains how to set up and use AI agents for a team. It appears below a "Coming Soon" message, providing a brief overview of the feature's functionality and inviting users to create a personal assistant. Translators should focus on conveying the process of knowledge base setup, model selection, and team collaboration.
